info.name: nexusmods.com - search input correction
info.description:
this style is intend to to do a correction to the search input if the viewport width is lower then 1280 pixels. normally starting with a width lower then equal then 1280 pixel the search input fields are ported into the next line. and somehow you can get troubles while hovering the mouse onto the menu.

test page
make sure you are logged in!
Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain

I am not a daily user of nexusmods.com so if you investigate any troubles due to site design changes please let me now.
